lines.content: * Allows user to interact with the chatbot
* Returns a Parser object that reads input from the user
* Returns a boolean value indicating whether a command is valid and has been executed
* @param taskList - TaskList from main that consists of Tasks that have been added by the user
* @return false if command user input is "bye", else true
* Responsible for writing Tasks to and reading Tasks from file
* The created file is located at "data/hewwoTasks.txt" by default
* Saves all the files in a given TaskList to file
System.out.println("an ewwow occuwwed whiwe wwiting to the fiwe: " + e.getMessage());
* Reads all the tasks saved in data/hewwoTasks.txt and converts them to a TaskList
* @return All tasks in data/hewwoTasks.txt as a TaskList
* Represents a type of Task that needs to be completed before a certain date
* @param description A string describing what the Deadline is for
* @param dateEntered A string in the format yyyy-MM-dd for when the task should be completed
* Formats a string into the format meant to save to file
* @return A String that has been formatted with the type Deadline, isDone,
* the deadline description and when it is due
* Formats a string into the format that is displayed to the user
* @return A String to display the Deadline information to the user
* Represents a type of Task that is an event carried out over a time period
* @param message A string describing what the Event is about
* @param fromDate A string representing when the Event starts
* @param toDate A string representing when the Event ends
public Event(String message, String fromDate, String toDate) {
* Formats a string into the format meant to save to file
* @return A String that has been formatted with the type Event, isDone,
* Formats a string into the format that is displayed to the user
* @return A String to display the Event information to the user
* Represents the task that user wants to keep track of, as an Object
* Returns a Task object containing the description
* @param description A String describing what the task is for
* Returns the description of the Task
* @return A String containing the task description
* Marks a Task as completed when loading from file
* Does not print the Task completion message
* Marks a Task as completed based on user input
System.out.println("hewwo kitty is so pwoud of youw fow compweting this task!");
System.out.println("this task has been mawked as not done :(");
* Formats a string into the format meant to save to file
* The string displays isDone as 0 or 1 if it has been completed
* @return A String that has been formatted with isDone and the Task description
* Formats a string into the format that is displayed to the user
* The String displays isDone and the Task description
* @return A String to display the Task information to the user
* Get the number of Tasks in a TaskList
* @return An int with the number of Tasks in the TaskList
* Marks Task as done at a given order in the TaskList
* @param i An int representing the order of the Task in TaskList
* Unmarks Task as done at a given order in the TaskList
* @param i An int representing the order of the Task in TaskList
* Adds a Task to the TaskList based on the user specifications
* Checks user input and creates a Todo, Deadline or Event object accordingly
* @param userString A String that consists of the user input
System.out.println("i've added youw new task: \n" + t);
System.out.println("you now hawve " + this.tasks.size() + " tasks, ganbatte");
* @param i An integer representing the order of the Task in the TaskList
System.out.println("you now hawve " + this.tasks.size() + " tasks, ganbatte");
* Adds each Task in the data/hewwoTasks.txt file to a TaskList
* @param task A Task read from the data file
* Formats all the Tasks in the TaskList to be written to an output file
* @return All the Tasks in TaskList as a String
* Formats all the Taks in the TaskList to be displayed to the user
* @return All the Tasks in TaskList as a String
String title = "hewe awe the matching tasks in youw wist!\n";
* Represents a type of Task with a description
* @param message A string describing what the Todo is about
* Formats a string into the format meant to save to file
* @return A String that has been formatted with the type Todo, isDone and description
* Formats a string into the format that is displayed to the user
* @return A String to display the Todo information to the user
* Consists of all the interface text displayed to the user
* Displays the starting message upon launching the chatbot
* Displays the closing message when user ends the chatbot
* Displays a message to the user when their command is not recognised
System.out.println("i hawve no ideaw what youwe twying to say :( twy again <3");
* Displays a message to the user telling them that they have entered an invalid
System.out.println("descwiptwion of a todo cawn't be empty! twy again :3");
* Displays a message to the user telling them that they have entered a date
* in an invalid format for a Deadline object
System.out.println("date and time entewed shouwd be in yyyy-MM-dd </3");
